name: Writesonic
tagline: AI writer for articles, blogs, and ads
description: Writesonic helps you create SEO-optimized content, marketing copy, and blog posts with AI assistance.
about: Writesonic is an AI writing platform designed for marketers, bloggers, and businesses. It offers tools for creating long-form content, landing pages, ads, and product descriptions. With built-in SEO optimization and support for 25+ languages, Writesonic helps you scale content production while maintaining quality.
